## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G20040](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G20040)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATIPT9, IPT9</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA ISOPENTENYLTRANSFERASE 9, isopentenyltransferase 9
- **Description:**   isopentenyltransferase 9;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT5G20040.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G20040.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT5G20040.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G20040.2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT5G20040.3](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G20040.3)
## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009005](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009005)&nbsp;---&nbsp;root&nbsp;---&nbsp;raíz (Spanish, exact), radices (exact, plural), radix (exact), 根 (Japanese, exact), aerial root (narrow), climbing root (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [atipt2 atipt 9]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Levels of iP-type and tZ-type cytokinins are unaffected in this mutant.
   - [atipt2 atipt 9]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;This mutant can be chlorotic.
   - [atipt2 atipt 9]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;cZR and cZRMP are almost undetectable in this mutant.
   - [atipt9-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Levels of cZR and cZRMP are reduced in this mutant compared to those of wild type.
   - [atipt9-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Levels of iP-type and tZ-type cytokinins are unaffected in this mutant.
   - [atipt9-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The levels of iPR contained in tRNA are decreased to 4% of those found in wild type.
   - [atipt9-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;This mutant can be chlorotic.
## Function-related keywords:
   - [root](/tags/root/)
